A

argParser(String[]) - Static method in class KivaKeli
Simple way to parse POSIX-standard command-line arguments.
askApiKey() - Static method in class KivaKeli
Asks user for OpenWeatherMap API-key and returns it as a String.

B

buildCityUrl(String, String, char) - Static method in class KivaKeli
Builds the OpenWeatherMap API URL, from city name, api key and temperature unit parametres and returns the URL.
buildGeoUrl(String, String, String, char) - Static method in class KivaKeli
Builds the OpenWeatherMap API URL, from geographical coordinates, the API KEY and temperature unit.

G

getUnitKeyword(char) - Static method in class KivaKeli
Convert character temperature unit symbol to API expected keyword.

H

httpRequest(String) - Static method in class KivaKeli
Returns the http GET response content from the url given as a parametre.

I

incrementStringArray(String[]) - Static method in class KivaKeli
Increase the size of provided String array by one.
ipGeoLoc() - Static method in class KivaKeli
Fetches geographical coordinates (latitude and longitude) from ip-api using the current user IP address.

K

keyFileManager() - Static method in class KivaKeli
Checks if the "api_key.txt" exists - if not, ask the user for the key and write it, and then the method returns the API-key as a String.
KivaKeli - Class in <Unnamed>
Print current temperature and weather condition in Finnish with UNIX-like command-line options.
KivaKeli() - Constructor for class KivaKeli
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class KivaKeli
Fetches OWM API key, parses command-line options and then prints weather information for the user.

P

parseArray(String, String, String) - Static method in class KivaKeli
Convenience method, parses JSON document for mathing fields in matching JSON array.
parseField(String, String) - Static method in class KivaKeli
Convenience method, parses JSON document for the matching field.
printWeather(String) - Static method in class KivaKeli
Prints current weather based on current device network location or city name.
